title: Echo Brain Complete Authentication System Implementation
content:
# Echo Brain Complete Authentication System

## Overview

A comprehensive user authentication system has been successfully implemented for Echo Brain with the following features:

## Database Schema

âœ… **Complete Authentication Tables**:
- users - User accounts with UUIDs, secure password hashing, account status
- roles - Role-based access control with permissions stored as JSONB
- user_roles - Many-to-many relationship between users and roles
- user_sessions - Session management with JWT tokens, IP tracking, device info
- oauth_providers - OAuth provider configurations (Google, GitHub)
- user_oauth_connections - OAuth account linking
- login_history - Security audit trail
- security_events - Comprehensive security logging
- password_history - Password change tracking
- user_mfa - Multi-factor authentication support
- api_tokens - API key management
- user_preferences - User preference storage
